backend/main.mo: Actor implementing user profiles and a contact-ticket system with admin/user authorization, supporting profile CRUD and ticket submission and updates.
feature_evidence.json: Feature-evidence report mapping frontend tracking UI features to related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file including components, hooks, styles, and assets.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based CSS defining color tokens, dark mode variables, and base styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component composing the page layout with header, sections, and footer.
frontend/src/components/ContactFormSecti: Contact form component using React Hook Form and backend mutation for free quote submissions.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Hero section with background image, headline, feature highlights, and smooth-scroll CTA buttons.
frontend/src/components/ServiceTiersSect: Renders a pricing section with three card restoration tiers and smooth-scroll contact button.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Displays footer with brand info, navigation links, and social media icons with smooth-scroll behavior.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Implements sticky header with scroll detection, desktop/mobile navigation, and smooth-scrolling links.
frontend/src/components/TrackPackageSect: Provides package tracking UI with user lookup and admin tools for updating tracking status and restoration steps.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity auth state, login flow, and context provider for storing and accessing user identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines mutation for submitting contact form data through the backend actor and invalidates related queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useTrackingAdmin.ts: Provides React Query hooks for admin checks and for mutating tracking states including creation, arrival, restoration steps, and shipping.
frontend/src/hooks/useTrackingQueries.ts: Defines hooks to fetch and cache tracking state data and to trigger refetches for specific tracking codes.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles, theme variables, dark mode colors, and utility classes including logo and text helpers.
frontend/src/lib/assetUrl.ts: Builds asset URLs using BASE_URL to ensure correct paths when served from subdirectories.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers to read, persist, and clear URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, fonts, radii, shadows, and enabling plugins for typography, animations, and container queries.
project_state.json: Describes the project state, features, and requirements for admin order tracking and status management.
